name: WWR Dropcloth Iron Panda (OPEN BOX)
description:
Dropcloth from World War Robot. 1:6 scale figure by 3A Toys. Designed by acclaimed artist Ashley Wood. Each robot is hand-painted and distressed, so no two are exactly alike. Limited 
Edition Figure! Images shown without decals. 

•	12 inch tall Dropcloth figure
•	Accessories
•	Storage pouches
•	Collector's model, not a toy.
•	Ages 15+
